text: Napoleon Broward was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Florida from 1905 to 1909.Florida's Past, Vol 2 People and Events That Shaped the State By Gene M Burnett, 2014, P.10 A series of progressive reforms were implemented during Browardâ€™s time as governor. Amongst others, these included the abolition of child labor, a pure food law, and speed limits for automobiles. His administration also championed mental health and education.Florida Governors Lasting Legacies by Robert Buccellato, 2015, P.41 ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Florida
title: Napoleon Broward
